artefact: Correct a mistake on your tax credits claim form

artefact.overview: Correct a mistake on your tax credit claim form - getting a new award notice
artefact.body:
Call the Tax Credit Helpline straight away to correct a mistake on your claim form.

Tax Credit Helpline
Telephone: 0345 300 3900
Textphone: 0345 300 3909
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm
Saturday 8am to 4pm

What happens next

If your claim hasn’t been looked at you’ll be sent an ‘award notice’ confirming how much you’ll get.

If you’ve already got your award notice the correction could mean you’re entitled to:

  • more tax credits - these are usually paid to you
  • less tax credits - you must pay back any money you weren’t entitled to

The Tax Credit Office will usually write to you confirming what will happen to your tax credits.

details.description: Includes working tax credit, child tax credit and when tax credits stop

artefact.title: Your tax credits go down or stop
